data.name: Dream Girls Collection
data.detailed_description:
CHECK OUT OTHER GAMES FROM HUNNY BUNNY STUDIO

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1920400/Bunny_Girl_Story/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1920390/Yummy_Girl_2/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1884430/Succubus_Girl_Story/


About the Game



Hello! We want to meet you! There are different animal girls among us, we live in different biomes, and we have different habits and characters. Someone is gentle, and it is better not to get close to someone. Who do you like the most?

CHARACTERS



Milk girl
Height: 166 cm
Three sizes: B97 / W58 / H93
Birthday July 5
Herbivorous
Habitat - Fields
Favorite food - Grass, oats.
TEMPER
Hi! I'm a very gentle girl, really, really! I really like to lie in the sun on the juicy grass and soak… Juicy grass by the way, this is my weakness… And in the morning, you will always have a glass of warm milk!


Tropical girl
Height: 166 cm
Three sizes: B97 / W58 / H93
Birthday December 11
Herbivorous
Habitat - Jungle
Favorite food - Bananas, leaves.
TEMPER
I am very playful and energetic! I can play, run and jump all day long! Come on, catch up with me… What, don't you want? Also tell me that you don't climb trees!


Snow leopard
Height: 166 cm
Three sizes: B97 / W58 / H93
Birthday April 29
Predator
Habitat - Taiga
Favorite food - Meat, fish.
TEMPER
I am a thoughtful, prudent girl, and very patient. There is no hurry in the snowy taiga. Your booty from you will not go anywhere, Arr! What did you think? Here you either have an icy heart or you are prey!

FEATURES


  • Puzzle game
  • Beautiful artwork
  • Animated characters
  • Relaxing music
  • CG Gallery Mode

    Rotate mosaics to make a picture.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: with 1 GB VRAM compatible with DirectX
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
-Nudity or sexual content
-Not suitable for watching at work
-Not suitable for all ages
-All characters in the game are over 18 years old
